Certaine godly and necessarie sermons, preached by M. Thomas Carew of Bilston in the countie of Suffolke ... Carew, Thomas, Preacher.
[342] p.
Printed [by R. Read] for George Potter, dwelling in Paules Church-yarde, at the signe of the Bible, At London : 1603.
Printer's name from STC. Includes 9 sermons. Signatures: A-X Y⁴ (-Y4). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
